periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Areas of fog. Mostly clear. Low around 76, with temperatures rising to around 79 overnight. East wind around 1 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: Areas of fog before 8am. Sunny, with a high near 95. Heat index values as high as 109. North northeast wind 1 to 7 mph.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 76. Heat index values as high as 106. Northeast wind 1 to 5 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.shortForecast: Sunny then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 1pm and 4pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Sunny, with a high near 94. Heat index values as high as 105. Northeast wind 1 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 1am and 4am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly clear, with a low around 75. Northeast wind around 3 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Partly sunny, with a high near 84. North wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. North northeast wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Sunny
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 80. North northeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 62. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 81. Northeast wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night

periods.name: Sunday

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 67. East wind around 5 mph.

periods.name: Monday

periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 1pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny, with a high near 85. South southeast wind around 5 mph.
